column4: have you tried adding pci=routeirq  to the boot options, that might help
I've heard mixxed comments on that.  I did that when compiling Linux Kernel 3.0.4     I've also tried to "sudo rmmod ehci_hcd" and "sudo modprobe ehci_hcd", but still no dice
my file transfers usually run around 26mbps
i'm talking about over gig *.avi files
